Directions.1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Spray a baking sheet with cooking spray.

Directions.2: Gently remove stems from mushroom caps. Dice stems and place in a bowl. Place caps on the prepared baking sheet with the open sides up.

Directions.3: Heat 1 teaspoon oil in a skillet over low heat. Add spinach and cook until wilted, about 2 minutes.

Directions.4: Add wilted spinach to the diced mushroom caps, along with feta cheese, garlic, and parsley. Mix until well combined.

Directions.5: Scoop spinach mixture and fill each mushroom. Drizzle mushrooms with remaining 1 1/2 teaspoons.

Directions.6: Bake in the preheated oven until golden brown, about 20 minutes.
